metadata.title: AW Professional Stand Up Hood Floor Hair Dryer Adjustable Height w/ Rolling Base Wheels Hair Beauty Salon

categorization.explanation: The product is a professional hair dryer with a stand and wheels, which is typically used in beauty salons or spas. Therefore, it fits best under the 'Hair Dryers & Accessories' subcategory of 'Salon & Spa Equipment' in the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category.
